attributes.action: Allow more flexibility for those on low income into the stock markets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Social capitalism is about all being included in the market.
With the government now owning 2 banking services it could now offer services and government legislation to offer more flexibility for those wanting to group together and invest in the market and to work with small hedge funds.
It could do this by offering tax credits for those who join in and by offering more flexibility with other tax credits currently offered to those on low and middle incomes in relation to savings limits.
